price: Alangkah besarnya penyesalan terhadap hamba-hamba itu, tiada datang seorang rasul pun kepada mereka, melainkan mereka selalu memperolok-olokkannya.
arabic: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāḥasratan ʿalā al-ʿibādi mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
